content:
nikomatsakis said:

also, I think that we should move those rules out from the hackmd and into the polonius book

a lot of them are, added as part of https://github.com/rust-lang/polonius/pull/126 but I think you only skimmed that one and didn't have time to look at it in detail, so I'm not sure whether it's acceptable.

nikomatsakis said:

actually, lqd, the approach your PR took, it's not "in sync" with the rules as documented, correct?

both the hackmd and the book refer to the placeholder loans approach
(dylan also had some interesting book/rules/souffl√© file automation to keep "everything" in sync :)

lqd said:

both the hackmd and the book refer to the placeholder loans approach

that was incorrect actually, the book has the rules we merged earlier today https://rust-lang.github.io/polonius/rules/loans.html#placeholder-subsets-and-illegal-subset-relations-errors

(it's the LocIns paragraph that has the version using placeholder loans, but that's expected :)

I'm updating the hackmd in any case, but we should indeed move the content only available in the hackmd to the book
